snippet: Goldman Sachs posts fourth-quarter profit of $2.89 billion. | JPMorgan Chase reports a record profit of $5.7 billion for the fourth quarter. | Goldman's results may translate into higher bonuses for its employees, but the mood is more dour at Morgan...
abstract: Goldman Sachs posts fourth-quarter profit of $2.89 billion. | JPMorgan Chase reports a record profit of $5.7 billion for the fourth quarter. | Goldman's results may translate into higher bonuses for its employees, but the mood is more dour at Morgan Stanley. | Momentum seems to be growing for a leveraged buyout of Dell.
